title: The Flood
lyrics:
And if I finally lose side of it
There's something that I hide in the heart of it
Imagine just how dark it is
Can you imagine how deep it is?
I know the ropes

Make my own way there

I hold the lines from way back when



I feel the pull of gravity

As if it to think it could fade on me

I start to feel there's nowhere to go

Light my mind in overload

But I made up my mind I'm coming back

I hold the line from way back then



We better leave before the flood

Before the earth has shaken all

And I've got the time to trace it back

I draw the lines from way back there
